title: SquirrelJulietGarden
author: SquirrelJulietGarden
created_time: July 12, 2022, 01:58:49 AMLast edit: July 15, 2022, 04:37:23 AM by SquirrelJulietGarden
content: Two years in forum and I have my life of consequence here.Briefly note on my contributionsBitcoinTransactions (complilation for newbies)Taproot - The biggest upgrade for Bitcoin since 2017 & documents to read.Bitcoin Taproot (Bech32m - bc1p) adoptionCreate Taproot address for your BitcoinBitcoin and cryptocurrency monthly, quarterly return (%)Websites for Dollar Cost Averaging DCAWebsites to check withdrawal fee and transaction feeAltcoinsDefine the (scam) DeFiRevoke Smart Contract Allowance with unrekt.netWebsites to check liquidity pools

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Nice but there is a special thread dedicated to this kind of self-praising posts:Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!You are free to keep this one if you want but I think it is better to have all posts of this style concentrated in the linked thread.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on July 12, 2022, 03:38:13 AMNice but there is a special thread dedicated to this kind of self-praising posts:Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!You are free to keep this one if you want but I think it is better to have all posts of this style concentrated in the linked thread.I will keep this one because I don't want my life of consequence thread will be covered by other posts.But I lock it now.
